channel.title: Understanding Extra Lessons
channel.managingEditor: extralessons@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Extra Lessons | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © Solid Gold Podcast Studios - all rights reserved

description.p: Have the words 'EXTRA LESSONS' popped up in your family recently?
If so, this podcast series is for you!

You'll hear Extra Lessons specialists answer parents' frequently asked question. They share their insights and advice, explain why extra lessons may be needed, how they work and also guide you on selecting the right Tutor for your child. They also answer questions on Maths, Afrikaans, CAPS, IEB and many other topics that will help you to help your child be the best they can be.

channel.itunes:subtitle: What to do when the words 'Extra Lessons' pop up in your family.
channel.itunes:author: Extra Lessons | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.title: Where to begin? | Stay calm, we've got this!
item.itunes:title: Where to begin? | Stay calm, we've got this!
item.itunes:subtitle: What to do when the words 'Extra Lessons' pop up in your family.
item.description:
Have the words 'EXTRA LESSONS' popped up in your family recently? If so, this podcast is just for you! Welcome to 'Understanding Extra Lessons', the podcast that helps answer all the questions that parents (and children) may have relating to Extra Lessons. In this episode you'll hear about the 5 stages of coping as well as assurance that you're not alone.

Do you have a question not answered here? Then please contact us via our websites KipLessons.co.za and FutureProofYourChild.net

Visit KipLessons.co.za or FutureProofYourChild.net to book your child's FREE Assessment

Do you need help making your own podcast series? Contact the experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
